headline: SLB Secures Major Role in Brazil’s Next Pre-Salt Expansion
summary: Global oilfield services company SLB has secured a major contract from Petrobras to provide services and technology for up to 35 ultra-deepwater wells in Brazil’s Santos Basin pre-salt province.

raw.headline: SLB Secures Major Role in Brazil’s Next Pre-Salt Expansion
raw.summary: Global oilfield services company SLB has secured a major contract from Petrobras to provide services and technology for up to 35 ultra-deepwater wells in Brazil’s Santos Basin pre-salt province.

headline: SLB Awarded Major Completions Contract for Ultra-Deepwater Project Offshore Brazil
summary: HOUSTON, September 25, 2025--Global technology company SLB (NYSE: SLB) today announced a major contract from Petrobras (NYSE: PBR) to provide services and technology for up to 35 ultra-deepwater wells in the strategically important Santos Basin.
